attributes.action: Allow all high risk cancer patients to have annual check up scans nationwide.
attributes.additional_details:
My Name is Stacey. At the age of 26 I was given just weeks to live due to an aggressive form of ovarian cancer. I have two young children and I married my husband from my hospital bed.
After pioneering last resort radical surgery by Christina Fotopoulo my life was saved.
Despite the cancer being very likely to return and unlikely to be caught in time without regular scans I was horrified to discover that the NHS do not offer check up scans to all high risk patients like me. 
Help save a life.
attributes.background:
I would like patients at high risk of their cancer returning or at high risk of being diagnosed with metastatic cancer to have life saving annual check ups no matter where they live. 
At the moment this is a postcode lottery. 
Please sign my petition. 
It may save your life or a loved ones life.
